item.title: • Set Photo Download Resolution
item.description:
Defines photo size downloaded. If you have a slow internet connection, it's recommended to decrease this setting.
You will only see options your Roku player supports.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Display Method
item.description: Determines how your slideshow displays your photos. This setting can be temporarly adjusted at runtime.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Delay
item.description: Defines the number of seconds between photos during your slideshow. This setting can be temporarly adjusted at runtime.

item.title: • Set Slideshow Order
item.description: Defines the order of your slideshow playback. This setting can be temporarly adjusted at runtime.

item.title: Link additional Google Photos account
item.description: Link an additional Google Photos account to this Roku device. There is no limit on the number of accounts you can link.

item.title: Remove account link from device
item.description: Remove Google Photos account link from this device

item.title: About
item.description: The PhotoView for Google Photos Channel, current version.... BLAH BLAH
